Text.Page:
This is where the other gods imprisoned Saleron at the end of the Divine War. Buried alive, basically, with only the remnant of his once-mighty prions for company.

The lesson of that little fable is pretty obvious, eh? Don't lose a war with the gods.

Saleron's pain, Saleron's problem. But there's a side benefit for us: mysterious mushrooms fed by Saleron's blood as it trickles through the rocks. Gather me some!

A fungus, fed on a god's blood.

I'm sure the Mysterium can put it to good use somehow. Best not to ask too many questions, eh?
